title: Bungie Director Fired After Misconduct Investigation - Kinda Funny Games Daily 08.28.24
description:
Head over to Patreon.com/KindaFunny for daily exclusive content!

The Kinda Funny Membership gets you Ad-Free and Exclusive Shows: https://www.youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames/join
http://www.patreon.com/KindaFunny 


Tim and Greg breakdown everything Nintendo showed at the latest Nintendo Partner Showcase and Indie World.

Today, you already got four hours of SnowBikeMike playing COD BLOPS 6 in Washington DC!
After, KFGD, you’ll get:
A Kinda Funny GAMESCAST all about our favorite controllers 
And – if you’re a Kinda Funny Member – Beetlejuice In Review.
For KF Members, You can also get today’s Gregway all about Celine Dion and Greg’s kindred spirit connection.
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Karl Jacobs & Delaney Twining

00:08:30 - Housekeeping
The Roper Report   -
00:10:20 - Bungie Director Fired After Misconduct Investigation, Jason Schreier @ Bloomberg
00:16:40 - Star Wars Outlaws Patch Is Stranding Some PS5 Players in Space, Forcing Them to Start New Saves, Kat at IGN
00:29:50 - Blue Protocol Dead, Death a Shitshow, Elie Gould @ PC Gamer
00:39:30 - Visions of Mana Review Round-Up
00:44:25 - GameStop Going Retro
00:52:30 - Wee News!
00:58:30 - SuperChats
00:59:11 - You‘re Wrong

yeah link park.com Lin park.com uh Story number one bungee director fired after misconduct investigation this comes from Jason shrier at Bloomberg Chris Barrett one of the top Executives at one of the video game industry's leading Studios was fired this spring after he was accused by several female employees of inappropriate Behavior according to people familiar with the matter starting at Bungie in 1999 Barrett Rose through the ranks as an artist and then director of the popular Halo and Destiny franchises and served on Bungie's board before the company was bought by Sony group Corp for $3.6 billion in 2022 until last summer he was also the director of marathon which the studio is hoping will become its next big game franchise but in late March he suddenly left the company behind the scenes Barrett was terminated following an internal investigation in which at least eight female employees raised complaints earlier this year that he had behaved inappropriately toward them according to

Barrett was terminated following an internal investigation in which at least eight female employees raised complaints earlier this year that he had behaved inappropriately toward them according to eight people including multiple women who reported Barrett as well as other bunge employees who were either involved in the investigation or spoke spoke to the women involved the people asked not to be named discussing private information the investigation found that Barrett called Lower Level female employees attractive asked them to play Truth or Dare and made references to his wealth and power within the studio suggesting that he could help Advance their careers according to two people familiar with the case don't do any of this uh in a statement to Bloomberg News Barrett said that throughout nearly 25 years at bunge quote I feel that I've always conducted myself with integrity and been respectful and supportive of my colleagues many of whom I consider close friends I never understood my
